title: 50 Years of Maastricht University
description: A commemorative collection celebrating five decades of academic excellence and innovation at Maastricht University from 1976 to 2026.

title: Modern Art in 3D
description: A Glimpse into the Modern Art Collection of the Museum van Bommel van Dam. Since these works, representing a variety of art, are not part of a permanent museum display, this project provides a venue to share their hidden stories to both a local and and a global audience.

title: Revisiting the Born-digital Archives of The Nieuwe Instituut
description: Exploring digital-native architectural archives and their preservation challenges in the modern era.

title: Contested Memories
description: A collection examining historical narratives and their multiple interpretations through 3D digitization.

title: A Genealogy of Home Cinema
description: Tracing the evolution of home entertainment technology through preserved artifacts and interactive exhibits.

title: Muffin's Journey
description: An archaeological journey following the life and travels of a remarkable historical figure.

title: Let There Be Light
description: An illuminating collection exploring the role of light in art, architecture, and human experience.

title: The Birthplace of Rembrandt in Leiden
description: A detailed digital reconstruction of the early life and environment of master painter Rembrandt van Rijn.

title: Vlooienburg Jewish Amsterdam
description: Documenting the rich cultural heritage of Amsterdam's historic Jewish quarter through digital preservation.

title: Codex Cospi
description: A digital exploration of one of the most important pre-Columbian Mesoamerican manuscripts.
